html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02742023-03-27FIN
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
Subject2023 Agreement Amending the 2020 Agreement Respecting Multi-Jurisdictional Pension Plans
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to ENTER into the 2023 AGREEMENT AMENDING THE 2020 AGREEMENT RESPECTING MULTI-JURISDICTIONAL PENSION PLANS in order to (1) clarify and simplify the regulations of multi-jurisdictional pension plans across Canada; and (2) enable the governments of Manitoba and Newfoundland and Labrador to join the 2020 Agreement.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: 2023 Agreement Amending the 2020 Agreement Respecting Multi-Jurisdictional Pension Plans
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to ENTER into the 2023 AGREEMENT AMENDING THE 2020 AGREEMENT RESPECTING MULTI-JURISDICTIONAL PENSION PLANS in order to (1) clarify and simplify the regulations of multi-jurisdictional pension plans across Canada; and (2) enable the governments of Manitoba and Newfoundland and Labrador to join the 2020 Agreement.
